title: File
description: Data files submitted by a user or generated by data analysis pipeline.

file_type.description: Specific kind of file to denote raw or processed

md5sum.description: A 128-bit hash value derived from a file for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage.

file_size.description: Size of the file in megabytes

file_location.description: Physical location of the file on the server

access.description: The Open Access data tier comprises public data not unique to an individual. The Open Access data tier does not require authorization. The Controlled Access data tier contains data that may be unique to an individual. All data types are stripped of direct identifiers. The Controlled Access data tier requires authorization.

file_format.type: mzIdentML, pdf, doc, xlsx, TSV, mzML, vendor-specific, FASTA, HTML

fraction_number.description: Chromatorgraphy fraction number of the file

downloadable.description: Indicates if the file is downloadable from PDC data portal

sha1.description: A 160-bit (20-byte) hash value derived from a file for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage.

data_category.type: Raw Mass Spectra, Processed Mass Spectra, Peptide Spectral Matches, Protein Assembly, Protein Databases, Other Metadata, Quality Metrics
data_category.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

original_file_name.description: Original name of the file at the time of when submission

dbgap_control_number.description: Study identifier from database of genotypes and phenotypes (dbGaP)
